definition: a recording of both the visual and audible components, especially one containing a recording of a movie or television program
details:
noun
- a recording of both the visual and audible components, especially one containing a recording of a movie or television program
= example: a recording of both the visual and audible components, especially one containing a recording of a movie or television program
= synonyms: video recording
- broadcasting visual images of stationary or moving objects
= example: broadcasting visual images of stationary or moving objects
= synonyms: television
- the visible part of a television transmission
= example: the visible part of a television transmission
= synonyms: picture
- the appearance of text and graphics on a video display
= example: the appearance of text and graphics on a video display
